description: Made from KÜHL’s exclusive KUHLDRY AKTIV™ knit fabric, the ENGINEERED™ Men’s Hoody has not just been designed, it’s been engineered! Superior moisture-management and odor resistance combined with strategically placed breathable, open-knit, panels allow you to stay fresh and active all day. Sun protection (UPF 25+) where you need it most, and UPF 20+ protection in breathable, open-knit panels.
name: Kuhl Kuhl Engineered Hoody - Mens
